description:
T1- Cherry (opp Cloudesley Suare Remove tree. T2 London Plane (opp5) Prune away from church building to give clearance of 3 metres. Prune back branch growing towards 2 cloudsley Suare to match the rest of the crown 
Prune back branch growing towards 34 Cloudsley Suare to match the rest of the crown 
Lift crown to give clearance of 6 metres above ground level on all sides
T3 London Plane (opp6) 
Prune away from church building to give clearance of 3 metres
Clear trunk to a height of 6 metres
Lift crown to give a clearance of 6 metres above ground level on all sides
T4 london Plane (near opp 7)
Prune away from church building to give clearance of 3 metres
Clear trunk to a height of 6 metres Lift crown to give a clearance of 6 metres above ground level on all sides
Prune to give  a clearance of 2 metres from telephone wires T5 Cherry (oop 7) Remove tree. T6 London Plane Prune away from church building to give a clearnace of 3 metres Clear trunk to a height of 6 metres lift crown to give a clearance of 6 metres above ground level on all sides. T7 sycamore (opp 18)  prune away from church building to give clearance of 5 metres above the road only
T9 Lime (opp 29) 
Prune away from church building to give a clearance of 3 metres. Clear trunk to crown break. Lift crown to give a clearance of 6 meteres above the road only
